product_name: The North Face RDT Crew T-Shirt - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Revolutionary FlashDryTM fibers in the lightweight RDT Crew T-Shirt from The North Face wick moisture away from the skin to keep you dry. It's a great shirt for long hikes in warm weather.
short_description: Revolutionary FlashDryTM fibers in the lightweight RDT Crew T-Shirt from The North Face wick moisture away from the skin to keep you dry. It's a great shirt for long hikes in warm weather.
